name: UpwardlyGlobal
description: A California non-profit solving a mutual problem of brain waste between talent and corporations by putting together recent immigrants with international university degrees and/or foreign experience having trouble finding jobs and local companies encountered skill gaps in the workforce or difficulty finding enough talent to fill their open positions. Apply Online
